sense.def:
Izraz
popularly
označuje, da neko ime uporablja večina ljudi, čeprav ni uradno.

seg.quote: This theory was popularly called the Big Bang.

sense.def:
Izraz
popularly
pomeni, da v nekaj verjame večina ljudi, čeprav morda ni res.

seg.quote: It is popularly believed that eating carrots makes you see better in the dark.
